title: Springfield High-Rochester game to start later on Friday due to heat concerns
content: ROCHESTER — Friday night’s football matchup between Springfield High and Rochester has been pushed back to 7:30 p.m. due to heat concerns. Temperatures in Rochester are expected to be in the 90s on Friday. The Rockets are 1-0 after an opening win against Decatur Eisenhower. Springfield High is coming off an opening loss to Sacred Heart-Griffin. Saturday's JV game will be at 9 a.m., with freshmen following about 11 a.m.
